overview: The two aspiring actresses Jeanette and Mimi are waiting for their big chance.  But the real breakthrough is slow in coming.  Jeanette especially desperately needs a big success, since her friend, the journalist Stephan, is about to lose his job.  When the two have their chance to take a ride in a posh car during a shooting, Jeanette slams on the throttle and the two friends take off.  Their aimless journey takes them to a fashionable winter sports’ hotel, where Jeanette reserves a name under “The Countess of Monte Christo”.  Everything’s going dandy; no one suspects a thing.  That is, until two impostors, Rumowski and “The Baron” take residence in the same hotel.
title: The Countess of Monte Cristo
